fields.description: Financial assistance awards (FAIN): The Federal Award Identification Number (FAIN) is the unique ID within the Federal agency for each financial assistance award.  Once an agency assigns a FAIN and reports it to USAspending.gov, the Federal agency may not- with limited exceptions modify the FAIN during the life of the award. Further, once a Federal agency assigns a FAIN, that Federal agency must ensure that the FAIN is clearly identified in all Federal award documents. As a term and condition of the award, Federal agencies must require that all recipients document the assigned FAIN on each subaward under the Federal award.
fields.name: FainAwardNumber
fields.title: FAIN Award Number

fields.description: A brief description of the purpose of the award
fields.name: AwardDescription
fields.title: Award Description

fields.description: The identifier of an action being reported that indicates the specific subsequent change to the initial award.
fields.name: AwardModAmendmentNumber
fields.title: Award Mod Amendment Number

fields.description: Total amount that could be obligated on a contract, if the base and all options are exercised.
fields.name: PotentialTotalValueAwardAmount
fields.title: Potential Total Value Award Amount

fields.description: Code for the country in which the awardee or recipient is located, using the ISO 3166-1 Alpha-3 GENC Profile, and not the codes listed for those territories and possessions of the United States already identified as 'states.'
fields.name: RecipientLegalEntityCountryCode
fields.title: Recipient Legal Entity Country Code

fields.description: The name corresponding to the country code
fields.name: RecipientLegalEntityCountryName
fields.title: Recipient Legal Entity Country Name

fields.description: U.S. Congressional district where the predominant performance of the award will be accomplished.
fields.name: PlaceOfPerfCongressionalDistrict
fields.title: Place of Performance Congressional District

fields.description: The name of the awardee or recipient that relates to the unique identifier. For U.S. based companies, this name is what the business ordinarily files in formation documents with individual states (when required).
fields.name: RecipientLegalEntityName
fields.title: Recipient Legal Entity Name

fields.description: The unique identification number for an awardee or recipient. Currently the identifier is the 9-digit number assigned by D&B referred to as the DUNS number.
fields.name: RecipientDunsNumber
fields.title: Recipient DUNS Number

fields.description: First line of awardee or recipient’s legal business address.
fields.name: RecipientLegalEntityAddressStreet1
fields.title: Recipient Legal Entity Address Street 1

fields.description: Second line of awardee or recipient's legal business address.
fields.name: RecipientLegalEntityAddressStreet2
fields.title: Recipient Legal Entity Address Street 2

fields.description: Name of the city in which the awardee or recipient's legal business address is located.
fields.name: RecipientLegalEntityCityName
fields.title: Recipient Legal Entity City Name

fields.description: United States Postal Service (USPS) two-letter abbreviation for the state or territory in which the awardee or recipient’s legal business address is located. Identify States, the District of Columbia, territories (i.e., American Samoa, Guam, Northern Mariana Islands, Puerto Rico, U.S. Virgin Islands) and associated states (i.e., Republic of the Marshall Islands, the Federated States of Micronesia, and Palau) by their USPS two-letter abbreviation for the purposes of reporting. Report legal business address located in the Puerto Rico, Northern Mariana Islands, American Samoa, Guam, and U.S. Virgin Islands using USPS assigned state codes.
fields.name: RecipientLegalEntityStateCode
fields.title: Recipient Legal Entity State Code

fields.description: Name of the level n organization that awarded, executed or is otherwise responsible for the transaction.
fields.name: AwardingOfficeName
fields.title: Awarding Office Name

fields.description:
Information should be identified in the FAADS PLUS files using the 'Record Type' field as follows:
1 - County-level aggregate reporting (for payments to individuals and other amounts identifiable by a geographical unit)
2- Normal transaction-level (action-by-action) reporting. These are non-aggregate records.
fields.name: RecordType
fields.title: Record Type

fields.description:
Financial assistance awards: Type of Assistance: The type of assistance provided by the award. (From FAADS user guide)
02 = block grant (A)
03 = formula grant (A)
04 = project grant (B)
05 = cooperative agreement (B)
06 = direct payment for specified use, as a subsidy or other non-reimbursable direct financial aid (C)
07 = direct loan (E)
08 = guaranteed/insured loan (F)
09 = insurance (G)
10 = direct payment with unrestricted use (retirement, pension, veterans benefits, etc.) (D)
11 = other reimbursable, contingent, intangible, or indirect financial assistance
fields.name: AssistanceType
fields.title: Assistance Type

fields.description: City where the predominant performance of the award will be accomplished.
fields.name: PlaceOfPerfCity
fields.title: Place of Performance City

fields.description: State where the predominant performance of the award will be accomplished.
fields.name: PlaceOfPerfState
fields.title: Place Of Performance State

fields.description: United States Zip code + 4 where the predominant performance of the award will be accomplished. This is the full zipcode with both parts.
fields.name: PlaceOfPerfZip+4
fields.title: Place of Performance Zip+4

fields.description: Six-position program number from the latest edition of the CFDA (left justified, space filled). Field is seven positions to accommodate possible expansion in this number. If CFDA program number is not available, a pseudo-code is used. This consists of the first two positions of the agency's CFDA program numbering series, followed by AAA, AAB, etc. for each program being reported. Program titles are listed in field 30.
fields.name: CFDA_Code
fields.title: CFDA Code

fields.description: The title of the program under which the Federal award was funded in the CFDA.
fields.name: CFDA_Description
fields.title: CFDA Description

fields.description:
Financial assistance valid codes:
00 = State government
01 = county government
02 = city or township government
04 = special district government
05 = independent school district
06 = State controlled institution of higher education Nonprofit agencies:
11 = Indian tribe
12 = other nonprofit
Private:
20 = private higher education
21 = individual
22 = profit organization
23 = small business
25 = all other

Procurement: Valid Code from FPDS-NG
fields.name: BusinessType
fields.title: Business Type

fields.description: The calendar month of the date on which, for the award referred to by the action being reported, awardee effort begins or the award is otherwise effective.
fields.name: PeriodOfPerfStartMonth
fields.title: Period of Performance Start Month

fields.description: The calendar day of the date on which, for the award referred to by the action being reported, awardee effort begins or the award is otherwise effective.
fields.name: PeriodOfPerfStartDay
fields.title: Period of Performance Start Day

fields.description: The calendar year of the date on which, for the award referred to by the action being reported, awardee effort begins or the award is otherwise effective.
fields.name: PeriodOfPerfStartYear
fields.title: Period of Performance Start Year

fields.description: The calendar month of the date on which, for the award referred to by the action being reported if all potential pre-determined or pre-negotiated options were exercised, awardee effort completes or the award is otherwise ended.  Administrative actions related to this award may continue to occur after this date.  This date does not apply to procurement indefinite delivery vehicles under which definitive orders may be awarded.
fields.name: number
fields.title: Period of Perf Potential End Month

fields.description: The calendar day of the date on which, for the award referred to by the action being reported if all potential pre-determined or pre-negotiated options were exercised, awardee effort completes or the award is otherwise ended.  Administrative actions related to this award may continue to occur after this date.  This date does not apply to procurement indefinite delivery vehicles under which definitive orders may be awarded.
fields.name: PeriodOfPerfPotentialEndDay
fields.title: Period of Perf Potential End Day

fields.description: The calendar year of the date on which, for the award referred to by the action being reported if all potential pre-determined or pre-negotiated options were exercised, awardee effort completes or the award is otherwise ended.  Administrative actions related to this award may continue to occur after this date.  This date does not apply to procurement indefinite delivery vehicles under which definitive orders may be awarded.
fields.name: PeriodOfPerfPotentialEndYear
fields.title: Period of Perf Potential End Year

fields.description: The prefix of the prime award indicating the Activity Address Code which is the department/agency and office issuing the instrument.  Use the AAC assigned to the program/funding office providing  the predominance of funding for the contract action as the program/funding office code.
fields.name: piidPrefix
fields.title: piid Prefix

fields.description: The last two digits of the fiscal year in which the procurement instrument  is issued or awarded. This is the date the action is signed, not the effective date if the effective date is different.
fields.name: piidAwardYear
fields.title: piid Award Year

fields.description: Procurement awards (PIID): The type of instrument by entering one upper case letter in position nine of the PIID. Departments and independent agencies may assign those letters identified for department use in accordance with their agency policy; however, any use must be applied to the entire department or agency.
fields.name: piidAwardType
fields.title: piid Award Type

fields.description: Procurement awards (PIID): The number assigned by the issuing agency in these positions. Agencies may choose a minimum of four characters up to a maximum of eight characters to be used, but the same number of characters must be used agency-wide. If a number less than the maximum is used, do not use leading or trailing zeroes to make it equal the maximum in any system or data transmission. A separate series of numbers may be used for any type of instrument listed in paragraph (a)(3) of this section. An agency may reserve blocks of numbers or alpha-numeric numbers for use by its various components.
fields.name: piidAwardNumber
fields.title: piid Award Number

fields.description: Procurement awards (PIID): The prefix of the prime award indicating the Activity Address Code which is the department/agency and office issuing the instrument.  Use the AAC assigned to the program/funding office providing  the predominance of funding for the contract action as the program/funding office code.
fields.name: ParentAwardIDPrefix
fields.title: Parent Award ID Prefix

fields.description: Procurement awards (PIID): The last two digits of the fiscal year in which the procurement instrument  is issued or awarded. This is the date the action is signed, not the effective date if the effective date is different.
fields.name: ParentAwardYear
fields.title: Parent Award Year

fields.description: Procurement awards (PIID): The type of instrument by entering one upper case letter in position nine of the PIID. Departments and independent agencies may assign those letters identified for department use in accordance with their agency policy; however, any use must be applied to the entire department or agency.
fields.name: ParentAwardType
fields.title: Parent Award Type

fields.description:
Procurement awards (PIID): The identifier of the procurement award under which the specific award is issued (such as a Federal Supply Schedule). Term currently applies to procurement actions only.

The number assigned by the issuing agency in these positions. Agencies may choose a minimum of four characters up to a maximum of eight characters to be used, but the same number of characters must be used agency-wide. If a number less than the maximum is used, do not use leading or trailing zeroes to make it equal the maximum in any system or data transmission. A separate series of numbers may be used for any type of instrument listed in paragraph (a)(3) of this section. An agency may reserve blocks of numbers or alpha-numeric numbers for use by its various components.
fields.name: ParentAwardNumber
fields.title: Parent Award Number

fields.description: Procurement and financial assistance awards:  The calendar day of the date the action being reported was issued / signed by the government or a binding agreement was reached.
fields.name: ActionDateDay
fields.title: Action Date Day

fields.description: Procurement and financial assistance awards:  The calendar month of the date the action being reported was issued / signed by the government or a binding agreement was reached.
fields.name: ActionDateMonth
fields.title: Action Date Month

fields.description: Procurement and financial assistance awards:  The calendar year of the date the action being reported was issued / signed by the government or a binding agreement was reached.
fields.name: ActionDateYear
fields.title: Action Date Year

fields.description: Financial assistance awards: Identifies the type of change to the award as follows: 'B' - Continuation (funding in succeeding budget period which stemmed form prior agreement to fund amount of the current action) 'C' - Revision (any change in Federal Government's financial obligation or contingent liability in existing assistance transaction amount of the change in funding; or any change in Recipient Name, Recipient Address, Project Period or Project Scope 'D' - Funding adjustment to completed project
fields.name: TypeOfAction
fields.title: Type Of Action

fields.description: The type of modification award or IDV performed by this transaction. A modification / amendment number of zero ('0') indicates the initial award. Valid entry from FPDS‐NG.
fields.name: ReasonForModification
fields.title: Reason For Modification

fields.description: The type of contract as defined in FAR Part 16 that applies to this procurement. Valid code from FPDS-NG: A Fixed Price Redetermination; B Fixed Price Level of Effort; J Firm Fixed Price; K Fixed Price with Economic Price Adjustment; L Fixed Price Incentive; M Fixed Price Award Fee; R Cost Plus Award Fee; S Cost No Fee; T Cost Sharing; U Cost Plus Fixed Fee; V Cost Plus Incentive Fee; Y Time and Materials; Z Labor Hours; 1 Order Dependent (this applies to IDVs only.  IDV allows pricing arrangements to be determined separately for each order); 2 Combination – (this applies to awards only.  Applies to awards where two or more of the above apply.)  Note:  this value is not valid for awards after September 30, 2009.; 3 Other (This applies to Awards only.  Applies to Awards where none of the above apply).  Note:  this value is not valid for awards after Sept 30, 2009.
fields.name: TypeOfContractPricing
fields.title: Type of Contract Pricing

fields.descrption:
The type of Indefinite Delivery Vehicle being (IDV) loaded by this transaction.
Valid code from FPDS-NG:
A GWAC – Government-Wide Agency Contract approved by OMB
B IDC – Indefinite delivery contract
C FSS – GSA or VA Federal Supply Schedule
D BOA – Basic Ordering Agreement
E BPA – Blanket Purchase Agreement
fields.name: idvType
fields.title: Type of Indefinite Delivery Vehicle

fields.description:
The type of award being entered by this transaction.
Valid code from FPDS-NG:
A BPA Call – call against a blanket purchase agreement
B Purchase order
C Delivery Order – delivery order or task order under an Indefinite Delivery Vehicle
D Definitive contract
fields.name: ContractAwardType
fields.title: Contract Award Type

fields.description:
The required FFATA award types related to financial assistance and contracts and are defined as follows:
 G - Grant
L - Loan
C - Cooperative agreement
O - Other form of financial assistance
P - Procurement (which includes purchase order, delivery order, task order)
This categorization is determined to be procurement if the award is reported through FPDS. If the award is reported through the ASP using the FAADS+ format, the Type of Assistance field below is used.
fields.name: FederalPrimeAward
fields.title: Federal Prime Award

fields.description: The amount of the award funded by non-Federal source(s), in dollars. Program Income (as defined in 2 CFR 200.80) is not included until such time that Program Income is generated and credited to the agreement.
fields.name: NonFederalFundingAmount
fields.title: Nonfederal Funding Amount

fields.description: The sum of the Amount of Award and the Non-Federal Funding Amount FIXME: renamed
fields.name: CurrentTotalFundingObligationAmount
fields.title: Current Total Funding Obligation Amount

fields.description: Total amount obligated to date on a contract, including the base and exercised options.
fields.name: CurrentTotalValueAwardAmount
fields.title: Current Total Value Award Amount

fields.description: The face value of the direct loan or loan guarantee.
fields.name: FaceValueLoanGuarantee
fields.title: Face Value Loan Guarantee

fields.description: All spending: The name associated with a department or establishment of the Government as used in the Treasury Appropriation Fund Symbol (TAFS) Account.
fields.name: AwardingAgencyName
fields.title: Awarding Agency Name

fields.description: A department or establishment of the Government as used in the Treasury Account Fund Symbol (TAFS). (defined in OMB Circular A-11)
fields.name: AwardingAgencyCode
fields.title: Awarding Agency Code

fields.description: Name of the level 2 organization that awarded, executed or is otherwise responsible for the transaction.
fields.name: AwardingSubTierAgencyName
fields.title: Awarding Subtier Agency Name

fields.description: Identifier of the level 2 organization that awarded, executed or is otherwise responsible for the transaction.
fields.name: AwardingSubTierAgencyCode
fields.title: Awarding Subtier Agency Code

fields.description: Procurement and financial assistance awards: Identifier of the level n organization that awarded, executed or is otherwise responsible for the transaction.
fields.name: AwardingOfficeCode
fields.title: Awarding Office Code

fields.description: Name of the department or establishment of the Government that provided the preponderance of the funds for an award and/or individual transactions related to an award.
fields.name: FundingAgencyName
fields.title: Funding Agency Name

fields.description: The 3-digit CGAC agency code of the department or establishment of the Government that provided the preponderance of the funds for an award and/or individual transactions related to an award.
fields.name: FundingAgencyCode
fields.title: Funding Agency Code

fields.description: Name of the level 2 organization that provided the preponderance of the funds obligated by this transaction.
fields.name: FundingSubTierAgencyName
fields.title: Funding Subtier Agency Name

fields.description: Name of the level n organization who has the requirements for the award, and whose parent agency provided the preponderance of the funds obligated by this transaction.
fields.name: FundingOfficeName
fields.title: Funding Office Name

fields.description: Identifier of the level n organization who has the requirements for the award, and whose parent agency provided the preponderance of the funds obligated by this transaction.
fields.name: FundingOfficeCode
fields.title: Funding Office Code

fields.description: The unique identification number for the ultimate parent of an awardee or recipient. Currently the identifier is the 9-digit number maintained by D&B as the global parent DUNS number.
fields.name: RecipientUltimateParentUniqueId
fields.title: Recipient Ultimate Parent Unique Id

fields.description: The name of the ultimate parent of the awardee or recipient. Currently the name is from the global parent DUNS number.
fields.name: RecipientUltimateParentLegalEntityName
fields.title: Recipient Ultimate Parent Legal Entity Name

fields.description: USPS zoning code associated with the awardee or recipient's legal business address. This is not a required data element for non-US addresses. (First five digits)
fields.name: RecipientLegalEntityZip
fields.title: Recipient Legal Entity Zip Code

fields.description: USPS zoning code associated with the awardee or recipient's legal business address. This is not a required data element for non-US addresses. (Last four digits)
fields.name: RecipientLegalEntityZip+4
fields.title: Recipient Legal Entity Zip+4 Code

fields.description: Postal service code for awardee or recipient not located in the United States. This is an optional data element, and used instead of the ZIP+4 Code for non-US addresses.
fields.name: RecipientLegalEntityPostalCode
fields.title: Recipient Legal Entity Postal Code

fields.description: The congressional district in which the awardee or recipient is located. This is not a required data element for non-U.S. addresses.
fields.name: RecipientLegalEntityCongressionalDistrict
fields.title: Recipient Legal Entity Congressional District

fields.description: The cash and noncash dollar value earned by the one of the five most highly compensated Executives during the awardee's preceding fiscal year and includes the following (for more information see 17 CFR 229.402c2): salary and bonuses, awards of stock, stock options, and stock appreciation rights, earnings for services under non-equity incentive plans, change in pension value, above-market earnings on deferred compensation which is not tax qualified, and other compensation.

fields.description: The identifier that represents the North American Industrial Classification System Code assigned to the solicitation and resulting award identifying the industry in which the contract requirements are normally performed.
fields.name: NAICS_Code
fields.title: NAICS Code

fields.description: The category name associated with the NAICS code
fields.name: NAICS_Description
fields.title: NAICS Description

fields.description: The calendar month of the current date on which, for the award referred to by the action being reported, awardee effort completes or the award is otherwise ended.  Administrative actions related to this award may continue to occur after this date.  This date does not apply to procurement indefinite delivery vehicles under which definitive orders may be awarded.
fields.name: PerioOfPerfCurrentEndMonth
fields.title: Period of Performance Current End Month

fields.description: The calendar day of the date on which, for the award referred to by the action being reported, no additional orders referring to it may be placed.  This date applies only to procurement indefinite delivery vehicles (such as indefinite delivery contracts or blanket purchase agreements).  Administrative actions related to this award may continue to occur after this date.  The period of performance end dates for procurement orders issued under the indefinite delivery vehicle may extend beyond this date.
fields.name: OrderingPeriodEndDay
fields.title: Ordering Period End Day

fields.description: The calendar month of the date on which, for the award referred to by the action being reported, no additional orders referring to it may be placed.  This date applies only to procurement indefinite delivery vehicles (such as indefinite delivery contracts or blanket purchase agreements).  Administrative actions related to this award may continue to occur after this date.  The period of performance end dates for procurement orders issued under the indefinite delivery vehicle may extend beyond this date.
fields.name: OrderingPeriodEndMonth
fields.title: Ordering Period End Month

fields.description: The calendar year of the date on which, for the award referred to by the action being reported, no additional orders referring to it may be placed.  This date applies only to procurement indefinite delivery vehicles (such as indefinite delivery contracts or blanket purchase agreements).  Administrative actions related to this award may continue to occur after this date.  The period of performance end dates for procurement orders issued under the indefinite delivery vehicle may extend beyond this date.
fields.name: OrderingPeriodEndYear
fields.title: Ordering Period End Year
